modName: Return to Tallon IV - A Recreation (Metroid Prime) (WIP)
summary: A recreation of the Tallon IV landing site from Metroid Prime. Fight against Meta Ridley and score some new armor and a weapon...
descriptionHtml:
STEAM VERSION: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=225437481]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=225437481[/url]


[b]--Summary of Tallon IV Recreation-- [/b]
Welcome back to Tallon IV that you know and love. Return to Tallon IV is a mini side adventure for Metroid fans to conquer. Within the mod you can explore several areas from Metroid Prime, including the Canyon Cavern, the Landing Site and the Alcove. In these areas you can find different pieces of new equipment, those being the Gunship Blade -- a custom reskinned sword made from the same material as Samus' gunship from MP3 -- Varia Space Jump Boots and Varia Gauntlets that have unique abilites and enchantments. Beware, though, as a familar foe resides within. That's right, Return to Tallon IV features a Meta Ridley reskinned dragon that you'll have to face if you want to get out alive!

This is a Work In Progress (WIP), it's fully functional but things are continually added. Enjoy the mod and GO METROID!


**Check the gallery for entrance location. Note: location isn't unlocked on download, must be discovered**




[b]-To Be Added-[/b]
*Expand upon the explorable areas.



-[i]Why is there an absence of Metroid Prime music?![/i]
Well, I'd rather not get banned or the mod removed if it contained the copyrighted music. I could have easily put it in.

[b]Thanks to the Nexus user 'IsharaMeradin' for creating the majority of the Varia Space Jump Boots higher jump script![/b]
author: Kyle8497

files.changelogHtml:
-Added a fight with Meta Ridley.
-Added Varia Gauntlets.
-Updated the texture of the Varia Space Jump Boots to look worn.
-Added a cave acoustic space to the cave area at the Landing Site.
-Changed the type of armor from Light to Heavy of the Varia Space Jump Boots.
